name: stock-logistic-poc
description: Sistema de Cotizaciones Inteligente - POC completa

scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:all: npm run test && npm run test:e2e
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm run build
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend

author: Stock Logistic Team
